Description: IN/ECD/21032022/01 - You have failed to ensure that the scaffolding you provided complied with the requirements for working platforms which are set out in The Work at Height Regulations 2005, Schedule 3. Specifically, the requirement that strength and stability calculations for the scaffolding be carried out for scaffolds that have not be assembled in conformity with a generally recognised standard configuration. The scaffold at 27 Beresford Road, London, E4 6ED did not conform to a generally recognised standard configuration.
